title: The VVestminster frolick. Or, A cuckold is a good mans fellow. A wanton wife that loved a relishing bit, in Westminster the same then she did get; and it is now concluded so together, her husband must be fain to wear bulls-feather. But yet the youngster he did not do well, ah silly fool! that he must kiss and tell; she may thank her self the business is so bad play with a man, n'er trust a tell tale lad. Tune of, Hey boys slap goes she; or, Alas poor thing!
publisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby at the Golden Ball in Py-Corner.,
